items.name: Meminfo: Active
items.description: Memory that has been used more recently and usually not swapped out or reclaimed.

items.name: Meminfo: Anon Huge Pages
items.description: The total amount of memory, in kibibytes, used by huge pages that are not backed by files and are mapped into userspace page tables.

items.name: Meminfo: Anon Pages
items.description: The total amount of memory, in kibibytes, used by pages that are not backed by files and are mapped into userspace page tables.

items.name: Meminfo: Buffers
items.description: Memory in buffer cache, so relatively temporary storage for raw disk blocks. This shouldn't get very large.

items.name: Meminfo: Cached
items.description: Memory in the pagecache (Diskcache and Shared Memory)

items.name: Meminfo: Commited AS
items.description: The total amount of memory, in kibibytes, estimated to complete the workload. This value represents the worst case scenario value, and also includes swap memory.

items.name: Meminfo: Commit Limit
items.description: The total amount of memory currently available to be allocated on the system based on the overcommit ratio (vm.overcommit_ratio). This limit is only adhered to if strict overcommit accounting is enabled (mode 2 in vm.overcommit_memory).

items.name: Meminfo: Dirty
items.description: Memory waiting to be written back to disk.

items.name: Meminfo: Get data
items.description: cat /proc/meminfo text

items.name: Meminfo: Hardware Corrupted
items.description: The amount of RAM the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

triggers.name: Memory:  Memória corrompida por falha de hardware
triggers.description: HardwareCorrupted - indica a quantidade de memória em "páginas envenenadas", ou seja, memória com falha detectada por ECC (Código de Correção de Erros).

items.name: Meminfo: Huge Pages Free
items.description: The total number of hugepages available for the system. This statistic only appears on the x86, Itanium, and AMD64 architectures.

items.name: Meminfo: Huge Pages Rsvd
items.description: The number of hugepages for which a commitment to allocate from the pool has been made, but no allocation has yet been made.

items.name: Meminfo: Huge Pages Surp
items.description: The number of surplus huge pages.

items.name: Meminfo: Huge Pages Total
items.description: Number of hugepages being allocated by the kernel (Defined with vm.nr_hugepages)

items.name: Meminfo: Inactive
items.description: Memory that has not been used recently and can be swapped out or reclaimed.

items.name: Meminfo: Memory Available
items.description: An estimate of how much memory is available for starting new applications, without swapping.

items.name: Meminfo: Memory Free
items.description: The amount of physical memory not used by the system

items.name: Meminfo: Memory Total
items.description: Total usable memory

items.name: Meminfo: Mlocked
items.description: Pages locked to memory using the mlock() system call. Mlocked pages are also Unevictable.

items.name: Meminfo: Shared Memory
items.description: The total amount of memory, in kibibytes, used by shared memory (shmem) and tmpfs.

items.name: Meminfo: Slab
items.description: The total amount of memory, in kibibytes, used by the kernel to cache data structures for its own use.

items.name: Meminfo: Slab Reclaimable
items.description: The part of Slab that can be reclaimed, such as caches.

items.name: Meminfo: Slab Unreclaim
items.description: The part of Slab that cannot be reclaimed even when lacking memory.

items.name: Meminfo: Swap Cached
items.description: Memory that is present within main memory, but also in the swapfile. (If memory is needed this area does not need to be swapped out AGAIN because it is already in the swapfile. This saves I/O and increases performance if machine runs short on memory.)

items.name: Meminfo: Swap Free
items.description: The remaining swap space available.

items.name: Meminfo: Swap Total
items.description: Total swap space available.

items.name: Meminfo: Swap Used
items.description: Swap Used (calculated)

items.name: Meminfo: Swap Used w/o cached
items.description: Swap usado sem cache

items.name: Meminfo: Unevictable
items.description: Unevictable pages can't be swapped out for a variety of reasons.

items.name: Meminfo: Writeback
items.description: Memória que está sendo ativamente gravada de volta no disco.

items.name: Swap: Swap In pages/sec
items.description: Swap in (from device into memory) statistics.

items.name: Swap: Swap Out pages/sec
items.description: Swap out (from memory onto device) statistics.

items.name: Memory: Memória disponível
items.description: A memória disponível é definida como a memória livre + a memória em cache + a memória de buffers.

items.name: Memory: Occupied
items.description: Occupied memory: total - available;

triggers.name: Memory: Overcommited memory (over {$MEMORY.OVERCOMMITED.RATIO}%)
triggers.description:
Please check graph -  Memory Overcommit

Debug:
1. Open top
2. Check rss and vss column
3. Get process wich using much memory
